chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Preload attribute can be the value of it.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: The first value can be none.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: This is the default value.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: It indicates that the browser should not preload the audio at all.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Preload means if you want to fetch the browser data first,

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: then you will use preload attribute.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Otherwise you won't use preload attribute.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Preload is equal to none.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: It is the default value.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Preload is equal to metadata.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: The browser will preload the audio information.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: It will preload the audio.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: It will preload the entire audio.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: Preload is equal to auto.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: It will be downloaded and automatically loaded.

chunks.title: Video, Audio & Media in HTML
chunks.text: So that when the user plays, the audio is saved.
